We are a small company (compared to others) which enables us to stay true and firm to our beliefs that YOU, the client comes first. We have been in business under The WareHive since 2010. Before hand we ran under the name OnDesigns were we ran a small local web design firm. We started to move away from web design to focus on the hosting side of the industry in mid 2009, where we came together with the current owners of another hosting company now known as The WareHive. We officially took over their operations in 2010 and we have been providing low cost web hosting to our clients ever since. The main reasons we are able to offer such get deals is the fact that we work very closely with our providers in long term contracts to help keep costs low.

The following is what "we" as a company stand by as a whole, when it comes to all of our products, whether it be Shared or VPS Solutions:

What We Do NOT Offer:

  • Unlimited Webspace Packages or those priced so low that we are losing money.
  • We do not Oversell ANY of our servers to accommodate the low prices that we offer.
  • We will not hold your money when you request a refund.
  • We will not refuse to help you move your site either to our servers or from them if you are not happy.
  • We will not suspend your account at the first sign of resource usage.
  • We will not turn you away because you want to host a large forum.
  • We will not hide behind our TOS. It may be big, but it is NOT a shield nor an excuse for bad customer service.
What We DO Offer:

  • Packages priced appropriately according to our business model so that we do NOT have to resort to overselling.
  • 30-Day No Questions asked refunds on all packages except for domains, software licenses, IP's and dedicated servers.
  • We will transfer your site to us at no-cost when you signup, and if you cancel for whatever reason we will help you move your site to your new host at no-cost.
  • We will work with you if you require more server resources long before suspending your account. (some exceptions to this of course)
  • We will custom make plans based on YOUR needs at a fair price.
The following is our current promotions for September 1st, 2013 through October 1st, 2013.
